overview: Mark is Chairman of the Board, President & Chief Executive Officer of Kana, Inc. Mark previously served as President & COO of Epicor Software Corporation. With over 26 years of experience as a senior executive, he has led every function within a software business, including worldwide sales and marketing, strategic planning, international operations, development and support. He also worked with Accel-KKR as their Operational Advisor for the purchase and privatization of KANA Software, Inc. in 2009. Mark received his First Class Honours Degree in Production Engineering from Kingston University in England.
